body:
Comment 2 by **paulo.jpinto**: 
Still if it is expected to use the value inside the path package, most Windows
developers will find it strange.

Plus it will complicate the path handling functions.

When I call path.Joint("directory", "file"), what separator will be used if more than
one is defined?

I vote to have path.DirSeps only containing what is the default expectation on the
target platform.
